name: Blasted Ballet
description:
A game made by Daniel Johnsen and Jordan Grider for The 3rd Beginners Circle Jam(Our First One!!!)

Use your ship's rocket to blast through the aliens holding you hostage. Will you be able to return home? Or will you be stuck in a strange glowing prison forever?

FEATURES:

  • Bounce around from enemy to enemy with a fast and floaty combat system
  • Progress through over 10 levels of alien killing :0
  • Listen to a mysterious man spout expository dialogue
  • The satisfaction of knowing you made me happy by playing it
  • The ability to leave a scathing yet fair comment about the game which will take away that satisfaction

Please play it and tell us what you think in the comments!!

Credits:

Daniel Johnsen - Programming, Game Design

Jordan Grider - Art and Visuals

Music by Eric Matyas

Find his stuff at: www.soundimage.org (It's really worth it)

Font by Severin Meyer

https://www.dafont.com/severin-meyer.d4920
